first step forward in eye transplants, although the

intended human vision.  Aaron James is
a 46-year-old veteran who had his
left eye transplanted during
complex facial reconstruction surgery
after he had an electrical accident at
work. I understand that this has
never been done before.  before so no

transplant showed positive signs
including stable blood vessels
and retina condition. Our initial goal
is to achieve
technical success with the eye transplant.  The most important thing is

healthy eyes. Although currently the transplanted eye
